Posts.Content: Idontlikethis3 wrote: Going to have me a glass of Champagne in the morning I'm not a fan of pills! Then I'm heading to the breast clinic for a stereo biopsy for my calcifications praying to God that when they look it's all gone! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Biopsy tomorrow Idontlikethis3 PeachRunner

Posts.Content: Idontlikethis3 wrote: Just got home from Vacation yesterday, Today was to have my biopsy and I woke up sick as a dog :(  I am so sick of this worrie I want it over with, but dont want to have to get the Biopsy,,, I know its the only way to tell if it is anything bad, but I am the biggest chicken in the world I think :( :(  Im so afraid of what it will tell me... I wish I had never gone for my first Mammo at all .... I could just leave it all alone and forget about it, but my kids and husband drive me crazy about it ... I know I sound like a stupid person, but I just dont like the idea of them sticking a drill gun in my Breast !  So many women on this board that has a birads 3 wants a biopsy, and here i have a birads 4 and dont want one, I asked the doctor twice cant i just come back in a few months, she said no i dont recomend that :(  I guess i just dont want to have to deal with it being cancer !! I smoke and have for many years god only knows what I have... I smoke more now because of this worrie ! im just very stupid !!!!! I feel like a baby.... I know they all say even my doctor you have a 78% chance it will be nothing but because I cant tell what kind of calcifications you have it is Indeterminate grouped calcifications we have to do a biopsy.. she said it can go with DCIS.  There are alot of women with breast cancer and it sure looks like alot  more than 20% !!! I just pray when I go If I go that they will have disapeared. Can that happen ? I made another appointment for next wed, I Have been praying to GOD that they are gone !!!! has anyone ever had that happen to them? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Biopsy for Calcifications Idontlikethis3 Ariom

Posts.Content: Idontlikethis3 wrote: She said I had a lot of calcification , they didn't get them All ! Does that make any difference ? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Biopsy done today question ? Idontlikethis3 Idontlikethis3

Posts.Content: Idontlikethis3 wrote: This is my question when you get a biopsy " I'm getting one due to group calcification on first mammo " I'm 49 . And let's say I'm in the poop pool of the 20percent that has it... The biopsy will say dcis or b9 or god forbid something worse .. How can they just say dcis after biopsy then when you get it out they can come back Nd say oh we found invasive cancer ??? I really don't like this , why don't they wait till they take it out before saying its dcis ? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Dcis Idontlikethis3 Beesie

Posts.Content: Idontlikethis3 wrote: Hi everyone, I wanted to ask a few questions if I could,, My sister in law was just diagnosed with Breast Cancer , she missed just one mammo , she has very large breasts , the lump is large very large either 9MM or 9CM I don't know about that I just know it is the size of a baseball,, I also know it is  a grade 3, it also says lymphvascular invasion absent..  can anyone give me a insite on what is to come? she see's the doctor on Thursday to learn more ;(  isn't grade 3 bad? her 2 is another thing on the report.. she is 58 years old.. Thank you for any information you can give me .,. as my brother is a total mess :(   Log in to post a reply
